answers.title: Reading a file in Python
answers.content:
To read a file in Python, you can use the `open()` function and then read the file using various methods. Here's an example:

```python
with open('filename.txt', 'r') as file:
  contents = file.read()
  print(contents)
```
answers.author: Bob
